law.catch_line: Copies Of Advertising; Filing With Commissioner; Revocation Of License
law.text: [ Text of section effective until August 1, 2012. Repealed by 2012, 106, Sec. 2. See 2012, 106, Sec. 9.] Each correspondence school shall file a copy of all its advertising with the commissioner. If the commissioner finds that a correspondence school engages in or has engaged in untrue, deceptive, or misleading advertising, he may revoke its license by proceedings in compliance with the provisions of chapter thirty A.
